WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO

About me

Hi ! I'm Arpit Tiwari

A Full-Stack Web-Developer based in Bengaluru

I have been working around Web-Designing for more than a year now. I enjoy building everything from simplistic business design to rich interactive web applications. I hope you find everything about me here. I am passionate about Web-Development and have worked on several tools including: React, Express, NodeJs, Tailwind, Bootstrap, MongoDB, MySQL, Git, GitHub. I'm an Engineering Graduate from Government Engineering College-Bilaspur, in Electrical Engineering. I've made numerous skill testing projects in the technologies mentioned. More recently, I've been Certified from iNeuron as a Full-Stack Web-Developer.

Connect with me..

Work & Projects

FULL STACK ECOMMERCE APPLICATION

A comprehensive application featuring REST API-product management, Secure user authentication, Efficient cart management, Separate user and admin Dashboard, Advanced product filters, and Seamless integration with Razor-Pay payment gateway for secure transactions. Leveraging MongoDB for storage and Mongoose for simplified communication, I prioritized user-friendly design and implemented S.M.T.P. contact functionality for enhanced customer support. It demonstrates my proficiency in full-stack development and showcases my ability to create elaborate, robust and user friendly web applications.

JAVASCRIPT ASSIGNMENTS

Task oriented projects in JavaScript enriched my skills as a JS Developer and helped me to write better and optimised code. Working with Syntax and Basic Concepts, DOM Manipulation, Events, Asynchronous Programming among others.
The Projects include :-
- Case Convertor,
- Ramdom Password Generator,
- Game of Rock, Paper & Scissor,
- QR code generator (using API) and more..

REACT ASSIGNMENTS

Engaged in a comprehensive project utilizing the React UI Development Library, where I delved into fundamental concepts such as Rendering, Scripting, and Component-Based Architecture. My proficiency with React extends to leveraging essential hooks like use-state, use-effects, and use-callback, demonstrating adeptness in implementing widely utilized concepts within React projects.

WORKING WITH TAILWIND

I have cloned some websites using Tailwind-CSS framework which is known for better control in styling from within the element. It can also be used along with style-sheet, However my work on cloning is limited only to the tailwind. It can be used for efficient styling and making websites better & faster.
- Shopify
- Rode
- Paytm

HTML & CSS

Projects purely based on HTML & CSS, building different kinds of web-pages.The features are screen responsiveness using HTML and CSS. I've utilized a range of HTML and CSS concepts like flexbox, box model, Document Object Model (DOM), media embedding, Formatting Document, CSS-Selectors, forms, decorations, meta-data, and more to create diverse web pages. These projects have been instrumental in honing my programming and web development skills, sparking my passion for the field.

Projects :

Portfolio Website

Embarked on my inaugural project by developing a comprehensive portfolio from the ground up. The design ethos was centered around minimalism, employing basic HTML as the foundation, complemented by Tailwind CSS for styling, including captivating animations. Leveraging JavaScript, I enhanced interactivity and responsiveness, ensuring seamless user experiences. Additionally, integrated an S.M.T.P. server to facilitate direct communication via the message section, fostering personalized engagement.

portfolio-arpit.netlify.app
MERN STACK e-commerce application

A comprehensive application featuring REST API-product management, Secure user authentication, Efficient cart management, Separate user and admin Dashboard, Advanced product filters, and Seamless integration with Razor-Pay payment gateway for secure transactions. Leveraging MongoDB for storage and Mongoose for simplified communication, I prioritized user-friendly design and implemented S.M.T.P. contact functionality for enhanced customer support. It demonstrates my proficiency in full-stack development and showcases my ability to create elaborate, robust and user friendly web applications.

ecommerce-application-by-arpit.vercel.app
JavaScript Assignments

Java-script Assignments to test my skills as a Java-Script Developer where I explored various industry wide used concepts such as Query Selectors, Event-Loops, Event Listeners, Set, Map, Closure, Promises, Async-Await etc by building Case Convertor, Rock Paper Scissor Game, Password Generator etc

passwordgeneratorbyart.netlify.app

Work Experience :

  • Independently built and hosted an e-commerce application. A MERN Stack application with all the standard features - authentication, token validation, search prediction query, routing, api data management, react prop drilling and functional animations, products Ô¨Ålter, cart management, order handeling, payment gateway and seamless design on a dark theme with frequent use of react hooks. Separate Admin and User routes were designed where admin has special accesses and rights, access to charts and statistics, User friendly interface makes it one of the best initial project for an entry level programmer. Cart, User and Product management with RESTful APIs where I managed the data gracefully with high precision and highly optimized code.
  • Built various projects on JavaScript for "Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp" by iNeuron which can be found in my portfolio as well as in github. DOM manipulation, Event Listeners, Functional Programming, HOF, OOPs, Asynchronous Programming with Async-Await or Promises along with Error-Handling and Troubleshooting etc are the highlights of these assignments.
  • Cloned popular web-applications such as Paytm, Shopify and Rode as a challenge from Tailwind Bootcamp using Tailwind CSS. These are complex designs which are entirely based on the current format of the original pages made entirely using HTML5 and Mobile first TailwindCSS Library.
  • React front end assignment to design a space-x landing page using rest APIs from the Space-X development engine. Extended CSS with React hooks and props I have utilized the API data to make a functional landing page. CSS animations are my personal touch as per the expected theme of the company.
  • Concurrently pursuing aspirations in Civil Services, I have leveraged my expertise as an educator, specializing in Higher Mathematics and Applied Physics instruction.
